title: Sample Data Structure
description: This is a test JSON file to validate the enhanced ingestion system with duplicate detection and content augmentation.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: This JSON file contains structured data that should be properly parsed and made searchable by the Cortex ingestion system.

sections.heading: Features
sections.text: The enhanced system should detect duplicates, augment existing content, and apply appropriate tags based on the file type and content.

sections.heading: Testing
sections.text: We'll upload this file multiple times to test the duplicate detection and content augmentation features.

notes: This file should be processed by ExtractJsonTextAsync and properly tagged with filetype_json, data, and structured_data tags.
